original_text: The priest must look at the person. If the skin has a white mark and white hair on it, the person has a disease. If the mark has no skin on part of it, the person has a disease. But it may not be a disease that he could give to other people.
korean_text: 제사장은 진찰할지니 피부에 흰 점이 돋고 털이 희어지고 거기 생살이 생겼으면

sentences.original_text: The priest must look at the person
If the skin has a white mark

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 위에 흰 털이 있다면

sentences.original_text: If the mark has no skin on part of it
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그 점의 일부에 피부가 없다면

sentences.original_text: But it may not be a disease
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것은 질병이 아닐 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that he could give to other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 다른 사람들에게 전염시킬 수 있는
